title: Harpers Ferry National Historical Park: Planning
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning             Planning        This page contains current and archived park planning documents.      Current Documents Green Parks Plan (website) Climate Friendly Parks (website)              Archived Documents Mt. Storm-Doubs Powerline Upgrade Environmental Assessment General Management Plan Record of Decision Draft Harpers Ferry NHP GMP/EIS General Management Plan, Newsletter #1 Document Type: PDF  General Management Plan, Newsletter #2 Document Type: PDF   td>            Documents Open for Public Review  Loading ...  There are currently no projects with documents open for public review for Harpers Ferry National Historical Park.    Other Plans and Projects An archive of completed projects as well as projects without documents open for comment may be found on the PEPC website.
